content: I'll definitely check out these jazz recommendations. I've heard of Chick Corea and Robert Glasper before, but I've never really delved into their music. I'm curious about Brad Mehldau's introspective style, and I've been meaning to explore more of Kamasi Washington's work. By the way, I was thinking of attending another concert soon, and I was wondering if you could help me with that. Do you know of any upcoming concerts or music festivals in the D.C. area?
